definition: to beat comfortably/to win easily/abbr. for 穩操勝券|稳操胜券, to have victory within one's grasp

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
to draw (a competition)/to fight to a standstill
grasp it and victory is assured/to have success within one's grasp (idiom)
to escape unscathed/to get through in one piece
odds of success/stratagem that ensures success/to be sure of success
to both share the limelight/to both have an equal share of
to be certain of victory/to be bound to prevail
opponent/substantial adversary/worthy match/antagonist/in the enemy's hands
to fit one into the other/to bring two things into contact
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
not much to choose between the two/tweedledum and tweedledee
